title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Practical Strategies for Academic Reading and Utilization of Library Resources

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze academic materials (papers, reports, professional books) to extract key content applicable to solving workplace problems
Learners can establish strategies for efficiently searching and utilizing digital resources from electronic journals and libraries
Learners can facilitate knowledge-sharing sessions with peer practitioners based on academic reading experiences
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
